text: 因为clawdbot不支持，腾讯云只是一键部署了一下而已

Upgraded from clawdbot 2026.1.24-3 (worked perfectly) to openclaw 2026.1.30 → agent responds to first message only, then dead silent. 

Clean uninstall, fresh install, same issue. 

Downgraded back to 2026.1.24-3 = works fine again.

Anyone else hitting this on 2026.1.30? Bug or

Clawdbot/OpenClaw + a Mac Mini to message their wife “good morning” every day? Then have a chat? 

I should start a mini SaaS! IYKYK.
